bug.author: merpnderp
bug.summary: Firefox and Safari mnist example runtime errors.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
0.8.0 <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Firefox 60.0b11 Safari 11.1 <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
In the mnist example I get an error on run in both Safari and Firefox. In Safari I get Unhandled Promise Rejection: TypeError: Type error in runtime:566 In Firefox I get "message: "'mode' member of RequestInit 'arraybuffer' is not a valid value for enumeration RequestMode."" in tfjs-examples-mnist.js line: 27561 <denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
I'm using the latest github clone for tfjs examples built with yarn and node 8.11.1

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/merpnderp>@merpnderp</denchmark-link> . We'll take a look.
